ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cut into 4 sections

cookingTips: Add cream cheese in sections and whisk well to ensure a smooth, lump-free soup
Simmer zucchini until very tender, approximately 15-20 minutes, for easy blending
Adjust seasoning with additional bouillon or salt depending on personal preference
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple soup relies on cream cheese for richness. How would you create a lighter version using Greek yogurt?
